reference.title: euscale-terminate-instance-in-auto-scaling-group
reference.shortdesc: Manually terminate an instance in an auto scaling group.

row.entry: The identifier of the instance to terminate.
Reduce the desired capacity of the associated auto scaling group by one.
Do not reduce the desired capacity of the associated auto scaling group. Auto scaling can launch a new instance to replace the instance terminated with this command.
Show extra information about the instance being terminated.

section.title: Output
section.p: This command returns a table that contains the following:

section.title: Examples
section.p: The follow example terminates an instance without decrementing the auto scaling group's capacity, showing extra information about the terminated instance.
The following shows sample output for this command.
section.codeblock: INSTANCE 194ea242-f7ea-4629-9f1e-a7ba46d435f3 InProgress At 2013-05-03T07:58:59Z instance was taken out of service in response to a user request.. 50 Terminating EC2 instance: i-ABC53ED7 2013-05-03T07:58:59.662Z
